snippet: Economists forecast that the Congressional deal would reduce economic growth by as much as 1 percent in the first quarter of 2013.
abstract: Investors expect rally in markets to start New Year following House approval of fiscal agreement, but surge is not expected to last long, with focus shifting to other economic hurdles; economists forecast that Congressional deal will reduce economic growth by as much as 1 percent in first quarter of 2013.
lead_paragraph: Economists forecast that the Congressional deal would reduce economic growth by as much as 1 percent in the first quarter of 2013.

headline.main: Even With Fiscal Agreement, Investors Facing Imminent Obstacles
headline.print_headline: Even With Fiscal Agreement, Investors Facing Imminent Obstacles
